channel.title: How to remove the R***SCAPE logo from my client opening screen
channel.description: the title says it all. I don't want the RS title to display on my server when it opens. I've already changed the background, I just don't know how to change the log in box or the rs logo to go away. 317 server. thanks!

item.title: How to remove the R***SCAPE logo from my client opening screen
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

If it’s an image you will probably need to use toms cache suite to remove the image/replace it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove the R***SCAPE logo from my client opening screen
